where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(it1 <* SELF\Representation.items | SIZEOF(QUERY(it2 <* SELF\Representation.items | it1.name = it2.name)) > 1)) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pvr <* QUERY(r <* USEDIN(SELF, 'REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS') | 'REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.PROPERTY_VALUE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(r)) | EXISTS(pvr.context_of_items.units))) > 0

entity.name: Unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(Amount_of_substance_unit, Electric_current_unit, Length_unit, Luminous_intensity_unit, Mass_unit, Plane_angle_unit, Ratio_unit, Solid_angle_unit, Thermodynamic_temperature_unit, Time_unit)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (EXISTS(street_number) OR EXISTS(street) OR EXISTS(postal_box) OR EXISTS(town) OR EXISTS(region) OR EXISTS(postal_code) OR EXISTS(country) OR EXISTS(internal_location) OR EXISTS(facsimile_number) OR EXISTS(telephone_number) OR EXISTS(electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS(telex_number))

function.name: valid_document_property_representation

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(dd <* Product_view_definition | (NOT ('REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(dd))) AND ('REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF(dd.defined_version)))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pv <* Product_version | (NOT ('REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF(pv))) AND ('REQUIREMENT_MANAGEMENT_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT' IN TYPEOF(pv.of_product)))) = 0
